Text: RE call options for the winter and the springDoesnt look like were going to be able to do anything with this for right now The demand for chemicals has made it necessary to guarantee production Let me know if anything else comes up Steve Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday December PM To Subject call options for the winter and the spring Steve As we discussed here are my indicative numbers for a daily call for the winter and for march and april JF MWh MA MWh These would be for a firm product I was thinking that if we could work on the structure alittle we could change that to UD with intraday flexibility Please call me to discuss when you get a chance Take care Doug

RE what is going onLots of traveling going on over here How about yourself Were still producing bucket loads of CL but are always open to seeing what kind of deals you have to offer I think I still owe you a beer Lets plan on lunch one day Steve Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January AM To Subject what is going on Steve What is happening out there Still busy producing bucket loads of chlorine or are you slowing down ready to do some power Trust all is well take care Doug
